title: Provision Software Upgrade on Core Router
description: A core network router needs a scheduled software upgrade during a maintenance window.

tasks.description: Verify the current software version of the target router.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the router is running an outdated version.

tasks.description: Push the new software image to the router's storage.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully transfers the new software file to the router.

tasks.description: Schedule a reboot for the router during the approved maintenance window to apply the upgrade.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully schedules the reboot for 2 AM.
